website_summaries.verdict: Carter's makes affordable swimsuits of good quality. This adorable sets keeps the body covered with style.
pros: Bottoms stay in place and have fun ruffle details
cons: Runs small so order a size up

customer_reviews.title: I ordered these in 3T for my 2yo girl. ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in 3T for my 2yo girl. She’s 27lbs, 36 inches, and fit her perfectly. So you probably wanna order one size up if your kids are above 70% for their height and weight.
customer_reviews.author: Kenzie Tran

customer_reviews.title: Pulls all over
customer_reviews.text: I just received the 4T crab bathing suit in the mail today, for my 4 year old daughter. We leave for vacation in 5 days and I'm very disappointed in the pulls all over the top. I do not have time to order another one, so we are just going to have to take this one to the beach. The only reason I'm giving it 2 stars (and not 1) is because it is a cute design, and if it wasn't for the pulls, it would be a really cute bathing suit. I expected better quality from Carter's.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Chemical waste smell
customer_reviews.text: This smells like it's been dipped in a toxic waste water. I cannot get out the smell. It's been outside 24 hours, cleaned 3 cycles, sat overnight in oxyclean. It still smells like chemicals. If you care about that sort of thing other products like ruffle butts are worth the extra money. I am stuck with this since I've washed it but I'll never buy this or any Carter's product again unless they stop using these harsh chemicals in baby clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Kim L.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but horrible quality
customer_reviews.text: After my daughter wore the swimsuit once for approximate 1 hour for her swim lesson and it's all snagged. Paid almost $20 for a swimsuit that looks like has been worn for years. This time I'm really disappointed with Carter's
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: sell separates please
customer_reviews.text: So I have a problem that it seems to be the one for many toddlers. My daughter is tall but super slim so even though her tops need to be a size 5T, her bottoms need to be 4T or even 3T. I would love to be able to purchase these separate to match her actual sizes. It's really hard for toddler girls to get that option, toddlers boys have more options on this.
customer_reviews.author: Naty

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! My daughter is between 12 and 18 months in Carter's clothing so I went with 18 months in the hopes it will last the whole summer. The sleeves are a little long (which isn't a big deal, I just roll them a couple times). 12 month bottoms might have been to tight on her with a swim diaper underneath.
customer_reviews.author: AlexisO

customer_reviews.title: Pretty darn good
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old is a tiny pasty white girl. I couldn’t use enough sunblock and she still burned on her shoulders and arms. I ordered the 4 because she’s tiny. The bottoms fit but the top isn’t snug. The problem this causes is when she uses those life jackets that go on her chest and arms and clip in the back it will start riding up and the strap then rubs her back. I love the suit, great quality, no burns. The only thing that would make me happier is if the top was snug with stretch like most older kid and adult suits are.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Cute and affordable
customer_reviews.text: I got this swimsuit because I trusted the Carter's brand because I know from experience that swimsuits online are not all created equal. I was pleased with the price and quality of the suit. It has started pilling after a busy summer of use. I expected that, though. I never machine dried it, so the graphics have held up. I NEVER machine dry any swimwear. My daughter will outgrow it by next season so it served my purpose. Still in great enough condition to donate on to another user.
customer_reviews.author: ordinarygirl

customer_reviews.title: Super super cute
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 3t for my 2 year old whos slightly above average size. So glad i did. The sizes run small. The bottoms fit slightly weird but overall is super cute! I got the navy blue mermaid top with pink bottoms. She loves it which is a bonus. We were looking everywhere for a rashgaurd top to keep her safe from the sun and this one is great for the price! If you order this size up
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Did not last
customer_reviews.text: This bathing suit is super cute and I ordered it and another design for my daughter. They both arrived in mid June. The other one fits perfectly, this one, the top fits great but the bottom the minute I washed it the second the elastic doesn’t work anymore. So she can’t wear the bottoms because they just slide right off of her. I was really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie P.

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for sizing
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for my twin girls in size 6 months. They sent one size 3-6 months and one size 6-9 months. They have a strong smell even after a few washes. The bottoms are also way too big for my girls, but we just bought cute reusable swim diapers to use for bottoms. They do offer great sun protection and the design is cute. I wish they would have sent two of the 6-9 months though.
customer_reviews.author: Carly Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Cute suit, great price, fits perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute bathing suit! Was happy to find a Simple Joys suit on Amazon, so I didn't have to go looking for one at a store. Really like all of the Simple Joys clothes, as they are good quality and good price. This suit was just what I was looking for -short-sleeve rash guard and regular bikini bottom. Didn't want long sleeves and long bottoms, as it gets very hot here in Georgia and I didn't want her to overheat!
customer_reviews.author: Banana Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Super cute bathing suit! My niece’s mom loved the color and was happy that it was a short sleeve shirt rather than bikini top. She is only a few months old, we want to protect her from the sun. She has a pink hat to wear and matches her bathing suits it was a perfect fit and was not too tight around the legs for her bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Restrepo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice suit
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 14 month old. It's a little big but I bought a size 18 months and she is only 19.5 pounds and 29.5 inches. The quality is great and the price is great too! Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SailorEve1112

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and great price!
customer_reviews.text: My 2.5 year old wears the size 3t in this suit. She gets lots of compliments and I love that I don’t have to apply so much sunblock when she wears this. The shirt keeps her cool and protected. One of my friends used a Coper-tone kids sunblock spray on her neck and it dripped onto the shirt, causing yellowish stains. I used shout spray and let it soak overnight. Stains came out in the wash.
customer_reviews.author: Chase's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Active Toddler Approved
customer_reviews.text: I loved how the swim suit stayed on my active toddler like it was supposed to. The arms/torso part didn’t roll up when playing in the water. I ordered the 18 months for my tiny 2 yr old and it is not tight at all. In fact it is a tad loose in the arms, neck, & torso areas. I am fine with that though it does not impact the swimsuits function. We got a lot of compliments on it at swim lessons the other days! It gives me peace of mind knowing my tiny, red head has extra protection from the sun!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica McKinney

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This came in clean and new, very well-made and fit perfectly. My daughter typically wears a 4T so we ordered that size- the bottoms fit great and the top is roomy and comfortable. I love the material. I will 100% buy from this brand in the future. I feel like it will hold up well on our weekend beach trips this summer.
customer_reviews.author: margella

customer_reviews.title: Adorable set!
customer_reviews.text: my 2 yo was screaming “mermaid!” At the first sight of the suit. Really cute set adorable colors and image. This is a must have for outdoor water play to avoid sunburns ( sunscreen is still needed of course, at least for the legs). Mine is 25 lbs and size 18 m fits well ( the pant is still a little too big tho, but acceptable, she will grow into it). Overall a very satisfactory buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Runs big
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set in the 24 month size for my 2 year old niece's birthday. She is very little so this is a bit big on her but the bottoms seem to be especially large, they fit her 6 year old sister. Even with them both being very petite, a 6 year old who wears a size 5 shouldn't fit in a 24 month bathing suit
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: CUTE design but not a good fit. top is too small, bottom is too big
customer_reviews.text: The swimming suit design is super cute and quality is nice. However, I purchased the 12 month size when my daughter was 9 months old, assuming it would be big on her at first then she would grow into it. At 9 months (height 81%/weight 51%), the top was a perfect fit and the bottom was WAY TOO BIG (even with a swim diaper on). Now that she's almost 1, the top is too snug (sleeves dont stretch out much) and the bottoms are STILL too big.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Buy this swimsuit! It’s soft and comfortable and adorable!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter looks so adorable in this swimsuit. I love that it comes with long sleeves and the optional top that isn’t so restricting. The fabric is soft and I just love everything about it. Seriously considering ordering the hammerhead one since it was so hard to decide!
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: Good adult, but didn’t fit great.
customer_reviews.text: We got the flamingo set and it’s adorable. Good quality, as with everything in this brand. However while the shirt fits ok, the bottom is at least one size too big on the 18m. She’s 21 lbs and 19 months, and wears 18m or 24m pants generally so I’m at a loss as to why these bottoms are so big.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 2 year old daughter for the summer. SO.CUTE. However, the arms were a little tight. She has normal toddler arms, so I suspect this may be a likely issue for some other 2 year olds. We got away with it this year though!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Cute and helps to keep warm in the water
customer_reviews.text: My daughter goes to indoor swimming lessons weekly, and the pool is always quite chilly and she ends up shivering before the end of class. Having the long sleeve rash guard has helped to keep her warmer and she doesn't shiver as much while wearing it. I also like that it provides SPF protection when we play in the water outside. Such a cute swim suit!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Harris

customer_reviews.title: Cute swimsuit - good sun protection
customer_reviews.text: I have a ginger baby who burns in the moonlight lol, so keeping her covered in the sun is important. One day at the lake, we forgot to reapply sunscreen when we needed to and the whole family got burnt (parenting fail!). But the swimshirt had my back. After tanning out (thank God she didn't peal!) my daughter has a solid farmers tan going because of this shirt! Definitely protected her from the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Christyn Biswell

customer_reviews.title: Way too big! Not true to size.
customer_reviews.text: This is super cute! But my goodness! It is huge! I am so so disappointed. My daughter fits 24 months. But as soon as I put it on. Especially the bottoms, looked like a 2t-3t size. I checked the label to see if they sent the wrong size or it got mixed up by mistake. It says 24 m. I’m so sad it doesn’t fit. She won’t fit in this for another year so now I’m back to shopping around...
customer_reviews.author: Susan A.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but the top was short and the bottoms were big
customer_reviews.text: Very cute design and good quality. My daughter wears pretty true to size 4t, I found the top to be a little "short and squatty" and be shorter than I want - I bought for full sun coverage. My daughter has a small bottom and these were a little big and would have shifted around too much. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Noeyyyyy

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little big.
customer_reviews.text: The top is a little big. The length is good but it is wide on my petite 3 year old. The bottoms fall a little also due to the waist band being a little large. I wish it was more fitted but it washes well and has held up good!
customer_reviews.author: Kniedzi

customer_reviews.title: Nice material
customer_reviews.text: This was so cute on my daughter! Unfortunately babies grow so fast so she only got to wear it a few times, but the quality is great! I love rash guards for young kiddos just to help protect them from the sun and this one was great!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my granddaughter and it is very comfy and cute. A little on the larger side but she is only 21 months and wears a 24 month. The 2T bathing suit was a little tight so I bought a 3T to make sure it was not tight.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Dreher

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: We love this suit!! Fit is great- the top is a little big, but she just turned 3, so I’m glad this will fit all year. The only negative is the smell. It has a skunky smell even after multiple washes.. still very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Codi

customer_reviews.title: Cute but small
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for both my girls ages 3 and 10 months. I got my 3 year old a 4t and the top fit great but the bottoms are a bit tight. Definitely will out grow quick. Besides that the suit is great!
customer_reviews.author: Britni

customer_reviews.title: Darling swim suit!
customer_reviews.text: This is a darling swimsuit!! My 5 year old absolutely loves it! The fabric is really great quality and my daughter has never burned with it on. I’d definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: BadaBeish

customer_reviews.title: Excellent SPF
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size up for my petite 16 month old for her ISR lessons. There is lots of room for her to grow into, and it’s not so big that it swamps her in the water. I would feel confident her wearing this on the beach because of the long sleeves and SPF plus she looks adorable in it!!
customer_reviews.author: S & P Mistry

customer_reviews.title: Super cute popsicle suit
customer_reviews.text: Super cute swim suit carters never seems to disappoint. But I always order one size up because they tend to run small and it fit perfectly. My 2 year old is petite but I still ordered the 3T fits like a glove
customer_reviews.author: Crisendia

customer_reviews.title: Great swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: Its a great swimsuit overall. The shirt is a little hard to get on a squirming baby. So if you don't want to struggle with that than I'd order a size up. But its fits great, I ordered a 3-6 month for my 4 month old. Shes 14lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Holtz

customer_reviews.title: Tight elastic in arms
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 12 mo for my daughter and it's very cute. The only thing is the short sleeve arms . The elastic in the sleeves leaves marks on her. I just broke the elastic but a little odd that the leg openings are almost too big while the arm opens too small. What baby doesn't have chubby arms? For reference my daughter wears 12 mo clothing and weighs about 20 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Tina G

customer_reviews.title: cuteness
customer_reviews.text: Great little suit for my 3 year old granddaughter. She's very petite. This may fit just a bit smaller than a true 3T. But it's as cute as can be and made extremely well.
customer_reviews.author: Christine B

customer_reviews.title: Cute, durable, fits well.
customer_reviews.text: This suit is perfect. I got it for my 9 month old and the top is a great size overall, the bottom is a little loose on her belly area, but she's quite petite so most things are loose in the waist. I love the style, the quality, it has been worn and washed several times and still looks great as new. Plus we get all sorts of compliments on how cute it is.
customer_reviews.author: Jans_Kay

customer_reviews.title: Poor material
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our 3 month old. It was very tight and had no give to it at all. She didn’t like getting this on what so ever. And taking it off after getting wet was even worse.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole W

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality of these bathing suits. Beautiful colors and thicker material, I know she will get good sun blockage. My daughter is a taller 3yr old. Fits well for her height but a little loose since I bought it at 4T (on purpose.)
customer_reviews.author: Asha Mathew

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great toddler swimsuit! 2 year olds are messy so went with the dark color so she wouldn’t be running around with stains all over. Worked like a charm and she looked adorable!
customer_reviews.author: nac

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent bottom sizing
customer_reviews.text: I bought two different sets and the bottoms weren't the same cut, even though they looked the same. One had a giant elastic and fabric nub inside the waistband I had to cut off.
customer_reviews.author: CMT926Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Sleeves a little long compared to size
customer_reviews.text: Cute. I got it a little big 18 months when she wears 12 months since on little ones it’s hard to take wet suits off when they stick to them if they are tight at all, so overall it fits well still but the sleeves are too long - so I had to hem them, but it works better then being tight and is cute.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianne Marzigliano

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute top, the bottoms run large
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute swim suite for my daughter (18 months). I use the top for a summer outfit when not going swimming. The fit is great for the top. The bottoms run large but stayed on ok with swim diaper. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny R

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this swim suit, it’s super cute! My daughter is almost 3 and I bought the 4T size, it fits her now with a little room to grow, might fit her next summer too. I love the 2 matching tops option.
customer_reviews.author: Iulia

customer_reviews.title: Love this suit
customer_reviews.text: ADORABLE. I needed a 2 piece bathing suit because I learned early on that changing a baby is WAY easier with a 2 piece. This is super. Cute. I love all the simple joys products. It’s great quality and it’s thick enough to trust that she won’t get burned!
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Wilder

customer_reviews.title: Perfect putfit
customer_reviews.text: My grandbaby needed something to keep her covered while hanging out by the lake with us. This was perfect as her 'Gigi' loves Mermaids.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Judd

customer_reviews.title: So sweet!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute suit!! I love how it can be worn 2 ways! The colors are bright and it’s help up really well. I’ve always had good luck with Carter!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie M Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Great upper body coverage, sand stuck in between fibers.
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It worked very well for a few hours at the beach. Loved the coverage on her arms. How the neck do you get the sand out of it?! I've washed it multiple times but when it is stretched, sand falls out from between the fivers.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M. Stone

customer_reviews.title: Strange odor
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great rash guard and serves the purpose but it has a strange odor to it. I own products of similar texture that don’t smell like this and I cannot wash the smell out - and it’s been three washes already. It makes me uneasy to have my baby wear this suit. (I bought the blue top “part mermaid just add water”).
customer_reviews.author: William F

customer_reviews.title: Mold grew after two uses!!
customer_reviews.text: After only two uses this rash guard grew mold! We always hang our swimsuits to dry in the sun, and only wash, and dry them after a few uses. This has always worked for my family of four’s swimsuits with no issues. This was the only suit to grow mold. I don’t recommend this set, but if you do buy it it might help to dry it in a dryer after each use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: My daughter just turned 4 and she is wear 5t on tshirts and 4t for bottoms. I think the 4T swimsuit was great a bit large on her bottom but good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable swimsuit. Cute design and protected my little one from the sun. Similar to other reviews, consider a size up. I ordered the 6-9mo size for my 9 month old and we had to keep pulling the top over her belly. The length of the arms and the bottom fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice! Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Love this swimsuit, very cute print! The bottom is a bit loose around the waist. It would be nice if it had an elastic to hold. Other than that the shirt fits perfect and plenty of room for my little one to grow Into.
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia

customer_reviews.title: Think it will be good for next year too
customer_reviews.text: So cute and fit perfectly on my baby. I sized one size up in hopes that it would fit her next year too and it is perfect! not to big but still has room to grow!
customer_reviews.author: Karyssa

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: The quality on this suit is very high. The top fits true to size and the bottom is a bit big, but my baby is on the smaller to average size.
customer_reviews.author: David Amerson

customer_reviews.title: Pants will small a little bit
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes it very much, but the pants are a little small, walking will be a little tight, the pants do not wear son, the clothes are ok
customer_reviews.author: Hang

customer_reviews.title: So cute but top is short
customer_reviews.text: This suit is so adorable but the top is short so my daughter belly sticks out when she lifts her arms and the sleeves a a bit short too. My friends little one has the same suit and she had the same issue with the top being too short.
customer_reviews.author: Nicci

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little small. But so cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. My baby is 20-months-old and wears between 18-months and 24-months depending on the brand. I should have bought a 24-Month for her.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bilderback

customer_reviews.title: Stinks
customer_reviews.text: It smelled really bad when it arrived washed it and it still smells terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Arms were a bit too long but overall all great fit
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and as expected. The arms were a bit too long but that just means more protection for little hands as that's where the sunblock is always getting rubbed off. Plus, it was very easy to fold the sleeves up.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Joy

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and well made
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is adorable in this. My daughter also likes the fit and style. Has worn it several times and wearing well.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! My two year old loves hers so much she wants to wear it just to wear it. Quick shipping, great price and fits as expected, definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Coble

customer_reviews.title: Really Cute Swim suite
customer_reviews.text: Really cute swim suite. Fit well and had some room to grow. My little one is 22 lb 33 inches and it fit good. Little long on sleeves but I just rolled them up!
customer_reviews.author: Lary

customer_reviews.title: Buy a size up
customer_reviews.text: Love this suit but definitely order a size up, the 12 month fits my 8/9month old. Will have to buy another one for our vacation in August.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Nice, fits good
customer_reviews.text: Cute. Fits good. Slow shipping. My daughter weights approx 20 lbs, about 27"- 28" tall. Wears 18 month clothing, I purchased this in a 18 months and fits perfect
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and fits great
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and fits great. Bought this for my 7 month old and it fit great. Helped protect her skin too. Loved the sweet mermaid writing on the front
customer_reviews.author: Adam & Karyssa Pierson

customer_reviews.title: Sooo cute
customer_reviews.text: Fits good, a little big in the bottoms but hey kids only get bigger. The colors are super pretty and bright and my daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Laisha

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price. You can tell the material is a little cheap, but considering it’s less than $20 that’s to be expected. Super cute design and fits pretty well - sleeves are a little long.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Get one size up
customer_reviews.text: Perfect but did get one size up because bathing suits are always a little smaller - fit great - thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Don’t size up!
customer_reviews.text: I read previous reviews about it running small and buy the next size up, don’t do that it fits exactly how it should. My daughter wears size 18 months in clothing so I bought size 24 months and it was too big.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Cute swim suit
customer_reviews.text: Cute swim suit for my little girl! She is 11 months old and about 24 pounds. I bought it a little bigger so she can use it longer. It’s a little loose but still fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena

customer_reviews.title: Keep your baby styling while protected from the sun
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. Easy to get on/off. Fit my daughter just right. Usually sleeves are short on her. These were perfect. The top has a smell to it...even after multiple washes. I’m hoping it eventually fades. Other than that, we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie White

customer_reviews.title: Very cute & affordable
customer_reviews.text: Fits my average sized 4 yr old well. Good quality and very cute. I paid around $16 and consider that a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great suit for under $20!
customer_reviews.text: This suit is adorable and fits exactly as it should. My babe is 17 months and 32 lbs. (big for her age!) Mainly everything she wears is 2T. This fits just right. Not too tight, still has some room to grow in it. The quality is really good also. Held up through 3-4 washes/swims with very little fade, snags, etc. Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: NewMamaof1

customer_reviews.title: Cute print but design flaws.
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay. Loved the print and colors but very tight trying to get it over her head considering I sized up. Wish there was button/zipper/snap/Velcro near the neck to help with it getting on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa W.

customer_reviews.title: Quality swim suit for toddler
customer_reviews.text: Really cute, easy to put on and take off, keeps toddler cool. Great for splashing in the pool. My only complaint is that the bottoms are a little large on my daughter and slide off sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: gpan

customer_reviews.title: Great baby swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: I love this swimsuit. My daughter is fair skinned and needs the sun protection. This keeps her covered and cool.
customer_reviews.author: SuzyQT

customer_reviews.title: So cute and nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bathing suit! We swim at the Y so it’s nice to have a long sleeve suit during winter. Fit my 2.3 year old perfectly, she is average size. About 27lbs. Just a tad roomy but not falling off at all so she can wear it for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Jefftimus Prime

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute baby swimsuit. Arrived as expected, great colors and quality. I love the Carter's brand and this suit did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite swimsuits for a baby. Long sleeves are a must with the sun. It fits perfectly and keeps uv away.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Adorable ❤️👍
customer_reviews.text: Just adorable! 3 year old loves her “popsicle” bathing suit! Isla is petite so the size 2 fits her perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for protection from sun
customer_reviews.text: Runs a little big. My daughter is 2 and on the smaller side. She usually wears 18-24 months. The bottoms were a little big on her in that size. Nice quality for the money.
customer_reviews.author: KarenA

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for granddaughter she looks adorable in it bottoms are little big but the top fits perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: This was an excellent purchase the quality was much better than anticipated and it is absolutely adorable
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Clark

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this! She’s worn this at 2 beach trips so far. It’s perfect for protecting her skin without worrying about the constant need to reapply sunscreen all day. It’s cute as can be.
customer_reviews.author: Shellie Parchman

customer_reviews.title: so cute, perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: fits my 2 yr old daughter perfectly and swimsuit is adorable. i always liked carter's brand--good quality
customer_reviews.author: Jas K

customer_reviews.title: Cute bathing suit
customer_reviews.text: Cute bathing suit. It was soft, and stretchy. The bottoms are a little big on my baby but the profit fine.
customer_reviews.author: Bet

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: I still prefer rash guards for my toddler and these are adorable and great price!
customer_reviews.author: WallieDollie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bottoms are too narrow in the crotch area and are too loose, so they barely cover the parts that need covered. The bottoms are also already dotted with pilling and look terrible, after just 4 wears for an hour each. The top also has some spots on it. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jen K

customer_reviews.title: Great for our toddler
customer_reviews.text: Bought these swimsuits for vacation so our toddler wouldn't burn her shoulders. Happy to report they worked perfectly and fit her like a glove. They're adorable in person, too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute Suit.
customer_reviews.text: My baby is a year and a half old, she usually wears 18-24 mos. I read other reviews before buying and got her a 3T. You should size up with these but I love the bright colors.
customer_reviews.author: Artsee

customer_reviews.title: Cute but bottoms too small
customer_reviews.text: I loved this suit but had to return it unfortunately. My daughter is still in diapers and I found the bottoms to be too small all over (skimpy) over a swim diaper. Otherwise, if your little girl is out of diapers...I highly recommend! Great value for a quality suit.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly C.

customer_reviews.title: Good for summer !
customer_reviews.text: This is would be so amazing if the bottoms were to be a bit smaller or tighter unfortunately the top fits my daughter perfectly not too big and not too small the bottoms well those are a lil bit too big !
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Good quality suit
customer_reviews.text: Good quality suit, just as advertised. My 11 month old who is 18.5lbs and 2'4" fits in it well. If it shrunk however I don't think it would still fit, so as the instructions say I didn't put it in the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: SpidyChic

customer_reviews.title: Great swim suit for 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this swim suit for use by a then 20 month old ~80 percentile height/weight baby girl. The suit fits well and is still in use @26 months. Has been used at the beach and in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: How to make a cute kid cuter
customer_reviews.text: I love the designs Carter's is doing for their swimwear "collection" — lots of choices, great quality, kids and grandmas love them! Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni Key

customer_reviews.title: Cute swimsuit but smells
customer_reviews.text: Cute swimsuit. Ordered 24 months for 18 month old and fits with some room to grow. Only negative is that it smells. Even after several washes, unable to get smell out.
customer_reviews.author: jkvy88

customer_reviews.title: Great suit for beach / pool. Fits well
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little suit for our kid. Fits nicely. She seemed very comfortable and the coverage is also perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Cakes

product_meta.title: Simple Joys by Carter's Baby and Toddler Girls' Assorted Rashguard Sets
feature_bullets: Rashguard And Bottom: 83% Polyester, 17% Elastane; Lining: 100% Polyester
Trusted Carter's quality, every day low prices, and hassle-free packaging-exclusively for Amazon member
